title: Accessing a Class's Field
description: In this program, create a TestClass object and output the message field in the Main.quorum editor tab. Call the SetMessage and GetMessage actions to output the following text, This is a message from the TestClass field, message.
answer: This is a message from the TestClass field, message.
hint: Start by adding the object block, TestClass testObject. This block has the type that matches the class name followed by the object name. Then use the object to call the SetMessage(e.g., testObject:SetMessage("This is a message from the TestClass field, message.")) and then the GetMessage(e.g., output testObject:GetMessage()) action.
